CustomField.formula: IMAGE( IF(ScoreValue__c=0, "/img/samples/stars_000.gif", IF(ScoreValue__c<0.20, "/img/samples/stars_100.gif", IF(ScoreValue__c<0.40, "/img/samples/stars_200.gif", IF(ScoreValue__c<0.60, "/img/samples/stars_300.gif", IF(ScoreValue__c<0.80, "/img/samples/stars_400.gif", IF(ScoreValue__c <= 1, "/img/samples/stars_500.gif", "/img/samples/stars_000.gif" )))))), "")
CustomField.label: Score Indicator
